title: Respect Client Consent for Communication
task: Respects clients’ wishes to decline certain system interactions
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to communicate with clients only after they give clear consent, so I respect their privacy.

title: Manage Notifications for Multiple Clients
task: Receive notifications about changes in Elena’s health data sharing preferences
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to see clear notifications with user consent, so I can care well without overload.

title: Manage shared device use in homes
task: Ensures privacy settings for each client are properly applied
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to control ALFRED on shared devices in clients' homes to protect privacy and avoid mixing information.

title: Manage client data access in shared homes
task: Adjusts sensor data sharing settings for clients to reduce information overload
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to switch client profiles easily on shared devices to keep each client's data private and avoid mistakes in homes.

title: Schedule Controlled Video Check-Ins
task: Schedules video check-ins for clients who prefer controlled interactions
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to schedule video check-ins only with clients who agree, so I respect their privacy and comfort.

title: Manage Social Invitations from Clients
task: Responds to social invitations from clients
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to decide how to respond to social invitations for my clients, so I can protect their wishes and avoid feeling too busy.
